title.rendered: What’s the difference between me and another person if I also sulk: Ashwin on WTC final

content.rendered:
In response to his exclusion from India’s playing XI for the World T20 2023 final against Australia, Ravichandran Ashwin commented,

“What’s the difference between me and another youngster or person if I also end up sulking inside…dressing room?”

Ashwin

“I was mentally prepared to play…but I was also mentally prepared not to play,” he continued. According to Ashwin, “I always try to stay in…present.”

Read Also: Sinner becomes the youngest man to reach the Wimbledon semis in 16 years

[…]
